name: Pinochle by Webfoot
description:
Play the classic card game Pinochle on your computer. Compete against the computer's AI player for a real challenge. Two-handed Pinochle is played with the standard 48-card Pinochle deck. The player who first reaches a total of 1,000 points wins a game. Enjoy a soothing soundtrack and smooth animated gameplay. Includes detailed in-game rules and help. Classic card game fun for all ages!

Features

* Real Pinochle rules
* Play against the computer AI
* Fast animated play
* Detailed game rules included
* Soothing soundtrack
